quote: Cordelia: I personally don't think it's possible to come up with a crazier plan.Oz: We attack the Mayor with hummus.Cordelia: I stand corrected.Oz: Just keeping things in perspective.
quote_letters: CORDELIA I PERSONALLY DONT THINK ITS POSSIBLE TO COME UP WITH A CRAZIER PLANOZ WE ATTACK THE MAYOR WITH HUMMUSCORDELIA I STAND CORRECTEDOZ JUST KEEPING THINGS IN PERSPECTIVE
chat:
Moritz - German given name meaning "dark-skinned"
Clue: "Name meaning 'dark-skinned' in German"

Urgent - requiring immediate action or attention
Clue: "Requiring immediate attention"

Therapy - treatment to heal or improve a condition
Clue: "Treatment to heal a condition"

Attacks - sudden and harmful actions towards
Clue: "Sudden harmful actions towards"

Nintendo - Japanese video game company
Clue: "Japanese video game company"

Theorized - speculated or conjectured about
Clue: "Speculated about"

Elliptical - shaped like an ellipse or oval
Clue: "Oval-shaped"

Nephew - a son of one's sibling or sibling-in-law
Clue: "Sister's son or brother's son"

Epidemic - widespread occurrence of a disease
Clue: "Widespread disease outbreak"

Militias - groups of citizens trained for military service
Clue: "Trained citizen military groups"

Yachts - luxury recreational boats
Clue: "Luxury recreational boats"

Jackson's - belonging to or related to the Jackson family
Clue: "Related to the Jackson family"

O'clock - indicating a specific time on a clock
Clue: "Time indicator on a clock"

Sorrow - feeling of deep distress caused by loss or disappointment
Clue: "Deep distress caused by loss"

Sizable - fairly large in size or extent
Clue: "Fairly large in size"

Warmth - quality of being warm, or having a high temperature
Clue: "Quality of being warm"

Hiring - the act of employing someone
Clue: "Act of employing someone"

Erupted - broke out suddenly and violently
Clue: "Broke out suddenly"

Depots - places where goods are stored for distribution
Clue: "Places for storing and distributing goods"

Optics - the study of light and vision
Clue: "Study of light and vision"

Nouveau - modern and new, especially in the arts
